## KindaPretty type

Prettify without rewriting function types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type KindaPretty<T> = T extends (...args: any) => any ? T : T extends Array<infer innerT> ? Array<KindaPretty<innerT>> : T extends object ? {
    [K in keyof T]: KindaPretty<T[K]>;
} : T;
```
